Subroutine vom_get_soilprofile

488 : 
489 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
490 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
491 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
492 : !*-----PARAMETER READING FROM SOILPROFILE.PAR---------------------------
493 : 
494 :       subroutine vom_get_soilprofile ()
495 :       use watmod
496 :       use vegwatmod
497 :       implicit none
498 : 
499 :       INTEGER :: stat, j
500 : 
501 : !     * The file soilprofile.par can contain information about thickness
502 : !       and soil properties in each soil layer, with the layer number in
503 : !       the first column.
504 : 
505 :       open(kfile_soilprofile, status='old', iostat=stat,               &
506 :      &     file=sfile_soilprofile(1:len_trim(sfile_soilprofile)))
507 :       if (stat .eq. 0) then
508 :         do j = 1, M___
509 :           read(kfile_soilprofile,*) M___, delzvec(j), ksatvec(j),      &
510 :      &      nvgvec(j), avgvec(j), thetasvec(j), thetarvec(j)
511 :           epslnvec(j) = thetasvec(j) - thetarvec(j)  ! porosity
512 :           mvgvec(j) = 1.d0 - (1.d0 / nvgvec(j))  ! van Genuchten soil parameter m
513 :         enddo
514 :       else
515 :         delzvec(:)   = delz_
516 :         ksatvec(:)   = ksat_
517 :         nvgvec(:)    = nvg_
518 :         avgvec(:)    = avg_
519 :         thetasvec(:) = thetas_
520 :         thetarvec(:) = thetar_
521 :         epslnvec(:)  = epsln_
522 :         mvgvec(:)    = mvg_
523 :       endif
524 :       close(kfile_soilprofile)
525 : 
526 :       return
527 :       end subroutine vom_get_soilprofile
